The max rate we can pay is $65/hr. They are looking to hire immediately.  The initial duration will be 3 months with possibility of extension and they are located downtown and Adelaide & Duncan
Could you let me know if you are interested and available in this opportunity?

Here are the specs below for your review:
Positions: Senior Software Developer, Product (2)

Ref.#         PHP-TO 111-115

Timing:     Immediately



The Team:

You will be part of our dedicated software product development team.



The Role:

This job is a technical position building software products for large brands to help them build, manage and measure their social media presence.

Responsibilities:

·      Design and implement product and platform features.

·      Proactively interface with our product management team to ensure that we’re building the right product for the right customers.

·      Prepare technical specifications and feature outlines.

·      Code primarily using PHP.

·      Work with 3rd party web services APIs like Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube.

·      Write unit and integration test cases.

·      Write bug reports, fix problems.

·      Work in a collaborative team environment.



Education/Experience:
You have 5 – 7 years of experience building software applications (preferably SaaS) and Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering.

Desired Skills:


·        Experience building SaaS applications.

·        Knowledge of social networking platforms (Facebook API, OpenSocial, Twitter).

·       Understanding of Model-View-Controller architecture.

·       Experience using web development frameworks (e.g. Rails, CakePHP, Django).

·      Knowledge of relational databases and SQL.

·      Experience using version control (SVN/Git) and bug tracking systems (Redmine/Fogbugz).

·      Rapid learner who thrives in a fast-paced environment.

·      Prior experience with building platform technologies a plus.

·      Expertise in programming languages.
